## zh-CN

区域延迟加载

## en-US

region lazy loading

````jsx
import { LazyImg } from 'hermes-react';
const LazyContainer = LazyImg.Container;

const defaultPic = 'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/xVlWbusndCKBqutbMGVm.jpeg';
const examplePics = [
  'http://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/KmbGeLULGnZfCIFRabuH.png',
  'http://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/VqLgauWQkaPyIsjZrSHy.jpeg',
  'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/OLSNFSycERsdqidvLtTh.jpg',
  'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/zraeuQGxkWiKBJBZhTyj.jpg',
  'https://gw.alipayobjects.com/zos/rmsportal/dYgYRotzMxzvqoXMKoLY.jpg',
];

function getImgs(num) {
  return Array(num).join(',').split(',').map(() => {
    return examplePics[Math.floor(Math.random() * examplePics.length)] + `?${Math.random()}`;
  });
}

class Demo extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.lazyContainer = null;
  }
  render() {
    return (<LazyContainer
      ref={ref => this.lazyContainer = ref}
      style={{
        height: 250,
        border: '1px solid #ccc',
        padding: '20px 0 0 20px',
        overflow: 'auto'
      }}
    > 
      {getImgs(50).map((v, i) =>
        <div key={i} style={{
          display: 'inline-block',
          border: '1px solid #ccc',
          margin: '0 12px 12px 0',
          fontSize: 0,
        }}>
          <LazyImg
            width="80"
            height="80"
            offset={20}
            src={v}
            placeholder={defaultPic}
            container={this.lazyContainer}
          />
      </div>)}
    </LazyContainer>);
  }
}

ReactDOM.render(<Demo />, mountNode);
````
